alert.note: Alert for Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:09AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Barnstable, southeastern Plymouth and southeastern Bristol Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 909 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Bedford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Fairhaven, Mashpee, Carver, Acushnet, Freetown, Mattapoisett, and Rochester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Plymouth; Southern Plymouth; Western Plymouth
